Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3857 affecting package libpng for versions less than 1.6.39-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-3857 affecting package libpng for versions less than 1.6.39-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libpng is earlier than 1.6.39-1, affected by CVE-2022-3857
